title: cintanai sheyyaDi
sahitya:
cintanai sheyyaDi manakkuyilE antamuDan nammaik-kAttiDum kandanai


anupallavi

  bandham vilagiDa pApam aghanriDa shen tAmaraik-kaNNan maruganai muruganaic-


caraNam    vaNNat-tOghai minnum mayil mIdinil tEn mozhiyAL vaLLi kunjariyuDanE
 manda mArutam vIshum kunram tanil vAn shuDarAi oLirum vaDivElanaic-
